alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:56PM MDT until July 13 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 455 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pinon, or 11 miles north of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Pueblo, Pinon, Pueblo Depot and Pueblo West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
